How many dumpsters are assigned to each house? Who do I contact for Hale County citations given outside City Limits?

You would need to contact Karen Davis , Justice of the Peace for Precinct 3. Her contact number is (806) 757-2481 and office hours are / Monday – Friday .

What is the process for requesting a trailer?

The City of Abernathy has a limited number of trailers available to in-town utility customers for waste disposal. Trailer requests are handled in the order received and may take several days before one is delivered to your address.

To request a trailer, please complete the trailer request form on the Public Works webpage or contact City Hall at (806) 298-2546

If you are unsure about what can be loaded onto trailers, please contact City Hall. Please note: .

Who do I contact about stray dogs and cats?

To check on a lost pet or report stray animals, please call (806) 298-2546 during regular business hours. For incidents that occur after-hours, please (806) 801-2700

How do I reserve City Hall’s Community Room for an event?

To reserve the City Hall’s Community Room, please contact (806) 298-2546 . The deposit is currently set at $50 with a rental fee of $100.

What is the lunch hour period for the City’s Library?

The lunch schedule for the City’s library personnel is 1pm – 2pm. Donations are also accepted by the Library Director in order to foster the growth of all Library programs.

For more Library information, please visit the Library webpage .
